games.title: Age of Tanks Warriors: TD War
games.description:
Lead Your Tank Warriors to Glory Across Time!
Welcome to Age of Tank Warriors: TD War, the ultimate tank warriors strategy game! Travel through the ages of war, leading your tank army from Stone Age warriors to the sci-fi space future. Upgrade your battle tanks, engage in intense Clash of Tank Warriors battles, and use tower defense (TD) strategy to conquer every era. 100vs100 survival battles await—will you rewrite history and become the greatest tank warlord?
games.howToPlayText:
Age of Tanks Warriors is a one-click battle game, so the actual combat portion of the game is fairly simple. The difficulty lies in the strategy of how you use your army and weapons to kill off your opponents before they kill you and destroy your fortress. Once you do this, you get to upgrade your army and weapons for an even more effective strategy.

The game begins with your stone cave, which is directly opposite your opponent's cave. You can deploy your soldiers by clicking the small icon on the bottom right of your screen. The only hitch is that you may not have enough soldiers to send out in time to match your opponent's troop!

Your task on each level is to defeat the opposing army and destroy their shelter. As the levels advance, so do the fortresses, making it even more difficult throughout the ages. Fighting begins with sticks and stones but eventually turns into tanks and artillery.

games.title: Tower Defense
games.description: A horde of horrible monsters is attacking your kingdom, build your towers fast and survive all the waves. If arrows or stones are not enough, use elements to your advantage and slay them all.
games.howToPlayText: Build towers on the free spots and they will automatically attack monsters that come near them. Use different combinations of towers and elements to your advantage. If you still feel pressured, use spells and upgrade your towers to maximum.

games.title: Trap Craft
games.description:
The Hacker is ready to fulfill any desire of a Princess, Noob, Pro, Herobrine and the rest.
He offers them to play a game: if you protect the portal from zombies, then the wish will come true!
Each character has its own funny ending! Find out all of them!

Features of the game Trap craft. Herobrine and Noob vs Hacker

- 6 adventures: Herobrine, Princess, Noob, Pro, Foxy, Imp!
- 12 pets - tame all!
- This is a walkthrough game, not just a mod.
- The main characters have inventory for items
- Unique abilities of weapons
- Different types of monsters: from zombies to Dragons!
- At the levels you will meet Entity 303
- Play together with friendly pets, set traps and fight against the hostile zombies of the cube world.
- Watch video exhibitions - learn the history of Herobrine, Princess, Nubik.
- The best Trap Crafting adventure game - defeat zombies, survive, craft traps, tame pets in a cube world.

And also try our other monster school games!
games.howToPlayText: You need to build a defense of your chosen traps against zombies. By killing zombies, you get coins that you can use to set traps in the way of zombies. Control the hero with the keyboard and mouse.

games.title: Kingdom Defense
games.description: Defend your kingdom in this epic online tower defense strategy game! Command warriors, cast spells, and battle fantasy monsters. Build your army and lead the conquest - action and adventure await!
games.howToPlayText:
Don't let enemies destroy your castle!
Destroy the enemy castle by buying soldiers with in-game coins!

games.title: Archery Master - Castle Battle
games.description: Defend your castle in Archery Master - Castle Battle! Battle orcs, monsters, and the undead in this epic archery game. Upgrade archers, use special arrows, and conquer kingdoms in action-packed tower defense warfare!
games.howToPlayText:
«Archery Master - Castle Battle» is an exciting archery game! Grab your bow and arrows and prepare for battle!  

You have a tower armed with skilled archers, and it’s up to you to defend your castle. Aim carefully with your bow and don’t miss your targets! 

The battle unfolds between the castle and the advancing army! Your mission is to destroy all enemies. Be warned: enemy troops may outnumber yours, their weapons are stronger, and their projectiles are more destructive!
Every shot counts—use them wisely if you want to claim victory! 

Conquering all the kingdoms won’t be easy. You’ll face orcs, humans, monsters, and the undead! Upgrade your archers, recruit mercenaries, use different types of arrows, apply poisons, and victory will be yours! 

Game Features:  
- Unique gameplay mechanics  
- Simple and intuitive controls  
- A variety of arrows and poisons to use  
- A variety of enemies to battle: orcs, humans, monsters, and undead
- Dozens of challenging levels  
- Upgradable archer bastion
     

Controls:    
- Tap to fire arrows

games.title: Warlock King - Castle Defense
games.description: Defend your castle from hordes of different enemies. Just destroy them one by one or cast spells to kill them in huge quantities.
games.howToPlayText:
-Just swipe the enemy to cause damage
-Click on the ability then click the place where you would like to apply it
-Upgrade spells
-Builds towers for defence castle

games.title: AOD - Art Of Defense
games.description: AOD - Art Of Defense Next is a dynamic tower defense game with elements of strategy and RPG in a post-apocalyptic world.
games.howToPlayText:
AOD - Art Of Defense Next is a dynamic tower defense game set in a post-apocalyptic world. As the commander of the A.O.D squad, you lead the fight against the ruthless cutthroats of Mr. Evil, who are seeking to find the lost Project Inola. With stunning isometric graphics, build your tech kingdoms and thwart the destructive ambitions of your enemy. Can you save humanity or will you succumb to darkness?

Game Features:

* Dynamic battles to keep you engaged.
* Elements of tower defense, RPG, and tactical strategy.
* Over 500 sectors for real-time battles.
* Various locations from small villages to huge metropolises.
* New tower defense modes: escape, fog, survival.
* Over 1000 unique upgrades for towers (tanks, miniguns, AA, etc.)
* 6 unique heroes to explore and level up.
* Nuclear bombs, ion satellite attacks, ballistic barrages, and more.
* Hundreds of upgrade cards for each tower.


Build towers! Protect your base! Use tanks, machine guns, and rockets (even nuclear). Upgrade and use heroes. Fight powerful enemies and formidable bosses! Protect your base and save the world!

Use the left mouse button to place a tower.
Use the scroll wheel/pinch to zoom on a touchpad to zoom in or out.

games.description: Defend your base from hordes of zombies by shooting them with various weapons and placing turrets, barricades and traps
games.howToPlayText:
On Mobile: Drag your finger on the screen — your character moves in the chosen direction
On PC: Use WASD or arrow keys to move

games.title: We not survive
games.description: We Not Survive is a thrilling tower defense game in a zombie-infested, post-apocalyptic setting. As the sole defender, protect your base from relentless foes by playing online for free. Upgrade weapons and resources, unlock skills, and prepare for intense battles against waves of undead. Are you ready to survive?
games.howToPlayText: The game is controlled by the mouse. You can control the speed of zombie attacks, as well as turn off music, sounds in the game. By clicking on "?" you can see explanations for each action icon.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/we-not-survive-d862-1?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Get Off My Farm!
games.description:
Protect your farm from relentless waves of mutant pests in this action-packed defense shooter!
Your quiet farmland is swarmed by strange and dangerous creatures, and only your guns and quick reflexes can keep them away from your crops. Blast through incoming enemies and pick up temporary power-ups along the way — rapid-fire shots, explosive ammo, health refills, or extra energy for your electric fence.

Survive enough waves and the stage ends, giving you a choice of random upgrades: unlock new weapons, call in a crop duster airstrike, slow down enemy hordes, attract power-ups with a magnet, and more. As you advance, new heroes with unique styles and abilities become available.

Every run feels fresh thanks to randomized upgrades and ever-growing chaos. Can you hold the line and prove yourself as the ultimate defender of the farm?
games.howToPlayText: Use arrow keys or WASD to move your character across the farm. On mobile, swipe the screen to move. Your weapon fires automatically, so just focus on dodging and aiming.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/get-off-my-farm?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Squid Game Tower Defense
games.description:
Squid Game Tower Defense battle against Squid Game characters in the towers. Complete challenges, defeat enemies, and become the victor in this thrilling fight!

Welcome to Squid Game Tower Defense — a unique and thrilling game where you will battle against characters from the famous Squid Game show. Unlike traditional Tower Defense games, your task here is not to defend towers but to attack and fight enemies that reside within them.

Each tower is not just a structure; it's a place where dangerous characters are waiting for battle. You'll engage in a series of exciting fights, defeating enemies at every level and overcoming various challenges. The game features characters well-known to all fans of the show, each with its own unique abilities and characteristics.

Complete levels, improve your combat skills, gather valuable resources, and unlock new opportunities for your battles. Make sure that your strategic abilities help you defeat even the toughest enemies standing in your way. Enjoy fast-paced combat, challenging missions, and an atmosphere that immerses you into the world of Squid Game.
games.howToPlayText: Fight with the squid characters in the towers. Use your skills and strategy to defeat the enemies in each level. Overcome the challenges and become a winner! Drag and drop your character onto the desired enemy platform.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/squid-game-tower-defense?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Kingdom Defender - Tower Defense
games.description:
Get ready for an exciting adventure where you must defend your kingdom from hordes of orcs, trolls, evil undead, and other vile creatures using towers and special abilities!

Fight in forests, mountains, and deserts, adapting your defensive strategy to the conditions with various upgrades and tower abilities! Summon flames beneath your enemies feet or freeze them, call in reinforcements, and battle legendary monsters to protect the kingdom from dark forces!

GAME FEATURES:
• Epic defensive battles that can captivate you for hours on end
• A variety of special tower upgrades and abilities to help you change your strategy
• Different enemies with unique skills, ranging from goblins to mighty undead
• Intense boss fights never before seen in the tower defense genre
• Extra difficulty levels that challenge your tactical skills
• Built-in encyclopedia with descriptions of towers and special abilities
games.howToPlayText: Place towers to stop incoming enemies. Activate abilities at the right moment to turn the tide of battle. Build your defense strategy and don't let the enemies breach the kingdom!
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/kingdom-defender-tower-defense?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Tower Necromancer's
games.description: You are a necromancer living in a tower, but the local kingdom sees you as a threat. They continuously attack, trying to destroy your tower. Defend against relentless waves of enemies, master dark magic to summon skeletons and zombies, upgrade and expand your tower, and develop strategies to counter different enemy types.
games.howToPlayText: On mobile, use your finger to grab and throw enemies. On desktop, use the mouse to pick up and launch them into the air.

games.title: Idle Tower Defense
games.description: Build your ultimate idle tower defense! Merge strategy, upgrades, and epic battles in this thrilling idle defense game. Protect your tower from endless waves of enemies in the best incremental game experience online!
games.howToPlayText:
Idle Tower Defense - Protect your tower from endless waves of enemies! 

Progression System:
• During combat: Collect "meat" to activate temporary battle upgrades
• Between battles: Spend coins on permanent improvements and unlock new features 

Controls:
• Left Mouse Button or Touch

games.title: Limited Defense
games.description: Play Limited Defense, a thrilling tower defense game! Command bandits, archers & explosive towers against waves of slimes, orcs & epic bosses. Upgrade defenses & unlock legendary heroes. Test your strategy now!
games.howToPlayText:
Drag the character on to the designated spot
Tap characters to open sub menu
Upgrade or sell characters
